description: This file defines the NotesAdapter class used to render and manage a list of notes within a RecyclerView, including user interactions such as clicking on a note or toggling its favorite status.

classes.name: NotesAdapter
classes.description: Adapter to render a list of notes with a minimalist card UI, managing note display and user interactions.

classes.name: NotesAdapter.VH
classes.description: ViewHolder class that holds references to the views within each note item layout.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Creates and inflates the view for each note item in the list.

methods.name: getItemCount
methods.description: Returns the total number of notes.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds data from a Note object to the views within the ViewHolder.

methods.name: updateData
methods.description: Updates the adapter's data set with a new list of notes and refreshes the view.

methods.name: NoteClickListener.onNoteClick
methods.description: Callback invoked when a note item is clicked.

methods.name: NoteClickListener.onFavoriteToggle
methods.description: Callback invoked when the favorite icon of a note is toggled.
